metadata.title: CVE-2020-10378 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In libImaging/PcxDecode.c in Pillow before 7.1.0, an out-of-bounds read canoccur when reading PCX files where state->shuffle is instructed to readbeyond state->buffer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10378` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-imaging - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.4
python-pil - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.4
python-pil.imagetk - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.4
python3-pil - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.4
python3-pil.imagetk - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-0ubuntu1.4').
